name: DARK FPS
description:
DARK FPS Discord: https://discord.gg/ChsNJdvE8g

DARK FPS V1.1.3 ALPHA

A realistic first person shooter game(early access)

This game contains Blood and flash images.

Contains tons of bugs in game.

---CONTROLS---

W,A,S,D to move

SPACE BAR to jump

G for grenade

R for reload

CRLT for crouch

W + SHIFT to run

123 to change weapons

F to pickup

LEFT CLICK to shoot

RIGHT CLICK to aim

----------------------------------
